title: Ticket #3093: Fix spurious test failures in regression test suite
description:
The regression test suite has spurious failures. There are (at least) two types commonly occurring:

1) Condor fails to start. This usually happens because condor_status returns 256. The current thought is that the collector might not be ready to accept a connection yet but this still requires more investigation.

2) Some tests, especially the dagman tests, seem to fail sporadically. This happens more commonly under heavy load (when running the tests in parallel). These might be real failures, it is probably test specific. Ticket #3090 deals with the Dagman tests, but other test improvements can get lumped under this ticket.

2012-Jun-28 11:49   Check-in [32512]: When starting a personal Condor, if condor_status fails then retry a few times instead of immediately erroring out. #3093 (By Scot Kronenfeld )
